projectsData.title: Tic Tac Toe
projectsData.subtitle: A simple game
projectsData.description: This web design is for Tic Tac Toe Game. It allows two players at a time to play the game within one minute.

projectsData.title: Age Calculator
projectsData.subtitle: Calculate your age
projectsData.description: This is a basic web design that allows users to input their date of birth and get their age.

projectsData.title: Pizza Shop
projectsData.subtitle: Order Pizza
projectsData.description: This is a Spring Boot project that allows users to order pizza from a pizza shop after successfully signing in or signing up.
